name: NSMethodSignature
desc: A record of the type information for the return value and parameters of a method.

items.name: + signatureWithObjCTypes:
items.desc: Returns an NSMethodSignature object for the given Objective-C method type string.

items.name: - getArgumentTypeAtIndex:
items.desc: Returns the type encoding for the argument at a given index.

items.name: - isOneway
items.desc: Whether the receiver is asynchronous when invoked through distributed objects.
